body_html:
@BernardoGO I would not expect .cuda() to work without CUDA, is a bit annoying to have to put if cuda_avaiable but explicit is better than implicit, so I am not that worried about that.

My point was just that crashing on import is a regression from 0.2, not something that it is supposed to happen.

@BernardoGO I would not expect .cuda() to work without CUDA, is a bit annoying to have to put if cuda_avaiable but explicit is better than implicit, so I am not that worried about that.
My point was just that crashing on import is a regression from 0.2, not something that it is supposed to happen.
body:
@BernardoGO I would not expect .cuda() to work without CUDA, is a bit annoying to have to put if cuda_avaiable but explicit is better than implicit, so I am not that worried about that. 

My point was just that crashing on import is a regression from 0.2, not something that it is supposed to happen.
